traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The corpse rook doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Three Heads
traits.desc: The corpse rook has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The corpse rook makes three bite attacks and one claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
